cards.title: microsoft​github​.com
cards.caption: create legit-looking github links that rickroll the visitor when clicked; apparently ${microsoftgithubusers} users have already been rickrolled; oh god, what have i done.

cards.title: discord-md-badge
cards.caption: a customizable badge that shows your Discord account, a server invite, or a bot account; it served ${requests} requests in the last 365 days... holy cannoli, that's ${dailyrequests} requests every day! thanks y'all!!

cards.title: spinmii
cards.caption: make your mii spin 360°, 'cause why not I suppose.

cards.title: errors
cards.caption: render an error dialog from a Wii U or 3DS, because, duh, who doesn't wanna do that.

cards.title: adobe-fonts-dl
cards.caption: download .otf fonts from any adobe fonts web project/typekit url.

cards.title: pretendo-network
cards.caption: basically, i did some stuff on the website: navbar, footer, account page, login page, blog, mii editor... yeah i think that's all.
